item.title: Binance: DEXLAB (XLAB) Token Airdrop Event to be Postponed
item.description: August 28th, the airdrop event of the DEXLAB (XLAB) token will be postponed, and the specific time remains to be determined.Previously, Binance Alpha announced that Dexlab (XLAB) will be launched on August 29th.

item.title: Cryptocurrency Card Issuer Rain Completes $58 Million Series B Funding Round, Led by Sapphire Ventures
item.description: August 28th: The issuer of cryptocurrency debit card, Rain, has completed a Series B funding round worth $58 million. This round was led by Sapphire Ventures and involved Dragonfly, Galaxy Ventures, Endeavor Catalyst, Samsung Next, and Lightspeed. According to another source with knowledge of the matter, the annualized consumption volume supported by Rain's debit cards has exceeded $1 billion.Rain has launched Visa-supported debit cards, enabling the spending of stablecoins wherever Visa is accepted. The company was founded in 2021 by CEO Farooq Malik and CTO Charles Yoo-Naut. Rain allows neobanks and fintech firms (such as Nuvei) to provide stablecoin payment services.Previously, on March 24th, Rain announced a funding round of $24.5 million, which was led by Norwest Venture Partners and involved Galaxy Ventures, Goldcrest, Thayer, and Hard Yaka.

item.title: Several companies, including MEI Pharma, experienced a significant stock price increase prior to announcing their crypto treasury, raising suspicions of insider trading.
item.description: On August 28th, as per Fortune magazine, the cancer drug developer MEI Pharma announced the commencement of a $100 million crypto treasury strategy in mid-July of this year. Just a few days prior to the announcement, MEI Pharma's stock price nearly doubled, even though there were no significant updates filed with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, no press releases issued, and minimal discussions on social media. MEI Pharma was not the sole company whose stock price witnessed unusual surges before announcing a cryptocurrency buying strategy. Fortune magazine discovered similar patterns in other small publicly traded companies, suggesting that insiders had prior knowledge of some announcements.A spokesperson for MEI Pharma declined to offer any comments. Spokespersons for four other companies—Kindly MD, Empery Digital, Fundamental Global, and 180 Life Sciences Corp—whose stock prices showed abnormal movements before making cryptocurrency purchases did not respo

item.title: River TVL has surpassed $600 million in just two weeks, with the circulating supply of satUSD reaching $270 million.
item.description: August 28th. According to official information, within two weeks, the Chainabstraction Stablecoin System Protocol River TVL exceeded $600 million. The circulating supply of satUSD reached $270 million. The protocol recently ranked second in the stablecoin category within the BNB Chain ecosystem for 30 days, and within 3 weeks, it had an accumulated NFT minting volume of 130,000.River is the first Chainabstraction Stablecoin System that enables assets to remain within their original ecosystem, whether it is DeFi, the stablecoin system, or the RWA public chain ecosystem. At the same time, through satUSD, users can smoothly participate in transactions and yield opportunities in other ecosystems, aggregating dispersed liquidity and redefining the relationship between assets and opportunities.

item.title: Ethereum PoS Network Exit Queue Reaches 1,075,000 ETH, While Over 730,000 ETH Wait to Join
item.description: On August 28th, based on the data from the Validator Queue tracking website "validatorqueue", the current exit queue on the Ethereum PoS network has risen to 1,075,268 ETH, which is approximately valued at $4.95 billion. The withdrawal delay has been extended to 18 days and 16 hours.Meanwhile, the amount of ETH waiting to join the network is about 738,733 ETH, approximately valued at $3.4 billion. It is also showing an upward trend. The admission queue is currently waiting for 12 days and 20 hours.Earlier reports suggest that this situation reflects two opposing forces in the market. On one hand, some stakers may choose to cash out after Ethereum's significant increase since the April low, resulting in a surge in the exit queue. On the other hand, new inflows of funds driven by regulatory optimism and institutional demand are also boosting the entry queue. This can be seen in publicly traded companies such as SharpLink Gaming and BitMine Immersion increasing their ETH holdings and

item.title: glassnode: Bitcoin Short-Term Holders in Loss, Facing Resistance in $113.6k-$115.6k Range
item.description: On August 28th, glassnode made a post on social media, saying, "The current trading price of Bitcoin is lower than the cost basis of 1-month and 3-month holders (which are $113,600 and $115,600 respectively). With short-term holders in a loss position, a potential price rebound may encounter resistance because these investors may choose to sell and exit at the break-even points."

item.title: Truist Securities Raises NVIDIA Price Target to $228
item.description: On August 28th, Truist Securities declared that it has lifted Nvidia's (NVDA.O) price target from $210 to $228. (Golden Ten)

item.title: Initial Jobless Claims will be announced tonight at 8:30 PM, with the probability of a rate cut in September currently standing at 87.2%.
item.description: August 28th: The US initial jobless claims (in thousands) for the week are scheduled to be announced this evening at 8:30. The expected value is 23, and the previous value was 23.5. Based on CME's "FedWatch" data, before the announcement of the initial jobless claims, the probability of a 25 basis point rate cut by the Fed in September is currently 87.2%, while the probability of rates remaining unchanged is 12.8%.The probability of the Fed keeping rates unchanged until October is 6.2%. There is a 49% probability of a cumulative 25 basis point rate cut and a 44.7% probability of a cumulative 50 basis point rate cut.The upcoming two FOMC meeting dates for the Fed are September 17th and October 29th.

item.title: ZachXBT has issued a Community Warning: web3 Token Presale Potentially Fraudulent
item.description: August 28th. On-Chain Detective ZachXBT issued a community alert stating that the crypto project conducting a token presale, web3 (@web3), is linked to members of the 2022 Squiggles NFT scam team and the notorious Raichu (Ryan), and this presale might be a fraudulent activity.On February 11th, 2022, the NFT project Squiggles was alleged to have used a series of shadow wallets to purchase NFTs from the project, generating a large number of fake transactions and was subsequently delisted by OpenSea.Raichu (Ryan) has been involved in multiple cryptocurrency and NFT project frauds. He collaborated with Lil Xan to promote the Baller Ape Club (BAC), which was later accused of a $26 million scam, and the founder was sued by the US Department of Justice (DOJ). He also collaborated with Rich The Kid to promote the Ancient Cats Club. Shortly after its launch, the team carried out a RUG, stealing $1.7 million.

item.title: ETH "Pump King" Tom Lee's Recent Performance: Three Times Right on the Money, Predicts End-of-Year Target Price of $10,000
item.description: August 28th. Tom Lee, as the newly appointed Chairman of the Board of BitMine, which is the first Ethereum treasury company, has been frequently expressing bullish views on ETH recently and successfully predicted three times in August:During the market pullback on August 19th, Tom Lee mentioned that a pullback to the range of $4075 to $4150 was healthy, and the market subsequently witnessed a rebound;On August 20th, prior to the dovish speech by the Fed Chairman Powell, Tom Lee forecasted that the market would rise due to the speech. After that, Ethereum briefly exceeded $4900;On August 26th, during another market pullback, Tom Lee predicted that ETH would bottom out in the next few hours. Once again, his prediction came true as ETH saw a rebound.In an interview on August 27th, Tom Lee made his latest prediction, stating that ETH will rise to $5500 in the coming weeks. The year-end target price is $10,000 to $12,000, and it will reach $60,000 within five years.
